Class LoginDatabaseHandler

java.lang.Object
  LoginDatabaseHandler

public class LoginDatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Part of the LoginServer example. Handles all database-related actions.

Author:
Sophie Engle

registerUser

public Status registerUser(java.lang.String newuser,
                           java.lang.String newpass)
Registers a new user, placing the username, password hash, and salt into the database if the username does not already exist.

Parameters:
newuser - - username of new user
newpass - - password of new user
Returns:
Status.OK if registration successful

Parameters:

Returns:

authenticateUser

public Status authenticateUser(java.lang.String username,
                               java.lang.String password)
Checks if the provided username and password match what is stored in the database. Must retrieve the salt and hash the password to do the comparison.

Parameters:
username - - username to authenticate
password - - password to authenticate
Returns:
Status.OK if authentication successful

removeUser

public Status removeUser(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
Removes a user from the database if the username and password are provided correctly.

Parameters:
username - - username to remove
password - - password of user
Returns:
Status.OK if removal successful
